Question: Bill Freeman was also Sports Car Club of America’s Southern Pacific National Champion during the ____ Freeman Racing period.
Hints: In February 1954, this person appeared in a screen test with James Dean, directed by Gjon Mili, for East of Eden (1955).
This person was named the Most Generous Celebrity of 2008 by Givingback.org.
This person established a policy that all proceeds, after taxes, would be donated to charity.
